TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Reusable Lookup to fetch Revenue category as well as Matrix Description for a Infinium GL Code
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: LKP_MATCH_MATRIXCODEMASTER

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT A.MATRIX_DESC as MATRIX_DESC, A.REVENUE_CTGRY as REVENUE_CTGRY, A.MATRIX_CD as MATRIX_CD FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.S_MST_MATRIXCODEMASTER A WHERE A.CURRENT_FLAG='$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG'

MAPPING.DESCRIPTION: This Mapping will load all the contract product data to CPPH_HIST table for all the Month to Month Contract data.
MAPPING.NAME: m_STG_TO_HOPM_S_TXN_CPPH_HIST_LOAD_MONTHLY_PRODUCT

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This Expression transformation populates the common columns as well as does the transformations required for the records flowing in from the S_TXN_CONTRACT_PRODUCT to the S_TXN_CPPH_HIST for Month to Month contract data.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_S_TXN_CONTRACT_PRODUCT

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: IIF(ISNULL(i_LDR_CHLNG_CD) , IIF(NOT ISNULL(i_CHLNG_RATE),'C', IIF(NOT ISNULL(i_LDR_RATE),'L','C')), i_LDR_CHLNG_CD)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_LDR_CHLNG_CD

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION:
IIF((i_PROF_MAP_CD='INSTALL_ACT_FEE_MATERIAL_RIGHT' OR i_PROF_MAP_CD='INSTALL_FEE_POB') AND i_ACTIVITY_FLAG = 'I' AND NOT ISNULL(i_DURATION),(i_DURATION*i_CHARGE_AMOUNT),i_CHARGE_AMOUNT)
--i_CHARGE_AMOUNT
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_CPPH_MONTHLY_CHARGE

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: IIF ((v_LDR_CHLNG_CD = 'L' AND NOT ISNULL(i_LDR_RATE)), IIF((NOT ISNULL(i_QUANTITY) AND i_QUANTITY>0), i_QUANTITY,1) * i_LDR_RATE , (IIF (v_LDR_CHLNG_CD = 'C' OR ISNULL(i_LDR_RATE), IIF(NOT ISNULL(i_CHLNG_RATE), IIF((NOT ISNULL(i_QUANTITY) AND i_QUANTITY>0), i_QUANTITY,1) * i_CHLNG_RATE, v_CPPH_MONTHLY_CHARGE))))
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_CPPH_MONTHLY_FV

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This has a SQL oevrride for fetching the records from Staging Table Contract Product that need to be loaded to Contract Product part Hopper for Month to Month contract data.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_SC_S_TXN_CONTRACT_PRODUCT

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE:
SELECT $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CPPH_HIST_CPPH_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL as CPPH_ID, A.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY, A.PRD_CATLG_KEY, A.ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER, A.USI, A.PRODUCT_CODE, A.PACKAGE_CODE, A.IN_DATE, A.CHARGE_AMOUNT, A.QUANTITY, A.INFINIUM_GL_CODE, A.ACTIVITY_FLAG, B.PROF_MAP_CD, B.LDR_RATE, B.CHLNG_RATE, D.START_DATE, D.END_DATE, H.BILL_DATE, H.CYCLE_BEGIN, H.CYCLE_END, E.BILLING_CYCLE, G.LDR_CHLNG_CD, I.CHARGE_AMOUNT_SUM, J.DURATION, (B.DPI_ENVRN || '|' || B.TARIF_CD || '|' || B.SVC_TYPE || '|' || B.PRD_CD) as CPPH_PRODUCT_PART_CODE, B.CORE_PRD FROM (SELECT DISTINCT BILLING_CYCLE ,BILL_DATE, ENVIRONMENT, CYCLE_BEGIN, CYCLE_END FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.S_PROCESSED_BILLING_CYCLE WHERE ETL_CYCLE_ID= $$ETL_CYCLE_ID ) H INNER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CUSTOMER E ON H.BILLING_CYCLE = E.BILLING_CYCLE AND E.CURRENT_FLAG = '$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' INNER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONTRACT D ON D.DPI_CUSTOMER_KEY = E.DPI_CUSTOMER_KEY --AND D.DPI_ENVIRONMENT = H.ENVIRONMENT AND D.END_DATE < H.BILL_DATE AND D.CURRENT_FLAG = '$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' INNER JOIN (SELECT DPI_CONTRACT_KEY, PRD_CATLG_KEY, ACTIVITY_FLAG, PACKAGE_CODE, ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER, USI, PRODUCT_CODE, IN_DATE, DPI_ENVIRONMENT, CHARGE_AMOUNT, QUANTITY, INFINIUM_GL_CODE, WIRE_CENTER
FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONTRACT_PRODUCT WHERE CURRENT_FLAG = '$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' AND ETL_CYCLE_ID <> $$ETL_CYCLE_ID AND ACTIVITY_FLAG <> 'O' AND CHARGE_TYPE = '$$PDT_CHARGE_TYPE' AND ETL_CYCLE_ID > 0 ) A ON A.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY = D.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY AND A.DPI_ENVIRONMENT = H.ENVIRONMENT INNER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_MST_PRD_CATLG B ON A.PRD_CATLG_KEY = B.PRD_CATLG_KEY --AND A.IN_DATE BETWEEN B.EFFEC_STRT_DATE AND B.EFFEC_END_DATE AND H.BILL_DATE BETWEEN B.EFFEC_STRT_DATE AND B.EFFEC_END_DATE LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_REF_WRCTR G ON A.WIRE_CENTER = G.WRCTR_NO AND G.CURRENT_FLAG = '$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DPI_CONTRACT_KEY,PACKAGE_CODE,SUM(CHARGE_AMOUNT) AS CHARGE_AMOUNT_SUM FROM RAESTG.S_TXN_CONTRACT_PRODUCT CH WHERE CH.CURRENT_FLAG = '$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' GROUP BY DPI_CONTRACT_KEY,PACKAGE_CODE ) I on I.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY = A.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY AND I.PACKAGE_CODE=A.PRODUCT_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN RAESTG.S_MST_ITEM_DURATION J ON J.PRODUCT_CODE=A.PRODUCT_CODE AND J.CURRENT_FLAG='$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG'

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This transformation is used to filter data whose CPPH_MONTHLY_CHARGE OR CPPH_MONTHLY_FV is 0
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: FIL_CHARGES_FV

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This Expression transformation populates the INFINIUM_GL_CODE for the Matric code lookup
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_CONTRACT_PRODUCT

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This target is populated with Contract Assembly information coming in from all the Contract Map tables in Staging Layer for Month to Month contract data.
INSTANCE.NAME: SC_S_TXN_CPPH_HIST

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Pre SQL
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: DELETE FROM $$RHOP_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CPPH_HIST WHERE DELTA_OR_MONTHLY = 'MONTHLY' AND STG_TABLE_NAME = 'S_TXN_CONTRACT_PRODUCT' AND ETL_CYCLE_ID = $$ETL_CYCLE_ID; COMMIT;

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This Expression transformation populates the INFINIUM_GL_CODE for the Matric code lookup
INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_CONTRACT_PRODUCT

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This transformation is used to filter data whose CPPH_MONTHLY_CHARGE OR CPPH_MONTHLY_FV is 0
INSTANCE.NAME: FIL_CHARGES_FV

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This has a SQL oevrride for fetching the records from Staging Table Contract Product that need to be loaded to Contract Product part Hopper for Month to Month contract data.
INSTANCE.NAME: SQ_SC_S_TXN_CONTRACT_PRODUCT

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This Expression transformation populates the common columns as well as does the transformations required for the records flowing in from the S_TXN_CONTRACT_PRODUCT to the S_TXN_CPPH_HIST for Month to Month contract data.
INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_S_TXN_CONTRACT_PRODUCT

MAPPINGVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Stores the value for the Active Flag for the Current_Flag
MAPPINGVARIABLE.NAME: $$RECORD_ACTV_FLG

MAPPINGVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Stores the ETL Cycle User Id
MAPPINGVARIABLE.NAME: $$ETL_CYCLE_ID

MAPPINGVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Stores the schema name for the Staging Tables
MAPPINGVARIABLE.NAME: $$STG_SCHEMA

MAPPINGVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Stores the schema name for the Hopper Mirror Tables
MAPPINGVARIABLE.NAME: $$RHOP_SCHEMA

SHORTCUT.COMMENTS: Source Defintion for Staging Table for Contract Product
SHORTCUT.NAME: SC_S_TXN_CONTRACT_PRODUCT

SHORTCUT.COMMENTS: Target Defintion for Hopper Mirror Table for Contract Product Part Hopper
SHORTCUT.NAME: SC_S_TXN_CPPH_HIST

SHORTCUT.COMMENTS: Reusable Lookup to fetch Revenue category as well as Matrix Description for a Infinium GL Code
SHORTCUT.NAME: SC_LKP_MATCH_MATRIXCODEMASTER
